text: Haarsh Limbachiyaa is an Indian screenwriter, producer and television personality. He has written the shows Comedy Circus Ke Tansen, Comedy Nights Bachao and Comedy Nights Live. Limbachiyaa also wrote Dialogues for the film PM Narendra Modi and lyrics for the title-track of the film Malang. He has also created, produced and hosted Khatra Khatra Khatra and Hum Tum Aur Quarantine. He is currently a host of India's Best Dancer with his wife Bharti Singh. ==Personal life== He is married to comedian Bharti Singh in 2017 . In the same year, Haarsh founded his production company- H3 Productions which produced the famous show Khatra Khatra Khatra. ==Filmography== ===Films=== {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Film !Role !Note !Ref. |- |2019 |PM Narendra Modi | |Dialogue Writer | |- |2020 |Malang | |Lyricist(Malang Title Track) | |} ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Show !Role !Note !Ref. |- |2011 |Comedy Circus Ke Tansen | |Writer | |- |2015 |Comedy Nights Bachao | |Writer | |- |2016 |Comedy Nights Live | |Writer | |- |2017 |Nach Baliye 8 |Contestant |Eliminated on 21st May 2017 | |- | rowspan="3" |2019 |Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 9 |Contestant |Eliminated on Week 6 | |- |Khatra Khatra Khatra |Host |Producer and writer | |- |Dance Deewane 2 |Guest | | |- |2019 |Big boss 13 |Guest | | |- | rowspan="5" |2020 |India's Best Dancer |Host | | |- |Hum Tum Aur Quarantine |Host |Producer and writer | |- |Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 10 |Guest | | |- |Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi- Made In India |Contestant |6th place | |- |Funhit Mein Jaari | |Producer and writer | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Participants in Indian reality television series Category:1987 births Category:Indian stand-up comedians Category:Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi participants
